column4: UPDATE 6-Warren Buffett's Berkshire takes $1 bln bite of Apple
column5: May 16 Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc  revealed a more than $1 billion stake in Apple Inc  in a rare foray into the technology sector  which Buffett has largely shunned apart from a poorly performing investment in IBM.
